turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order from Bella Luna pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want to order four large pizzas, two of them with sausage, the other two with pepperoni, and all need to be with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok you said 2 large total or 2 of each?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four total, two so two of each.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and just to let you know they charge for additional cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $100, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. Just charge it to the account online.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
